translations: （Mitre）人名；（西、罗）米特雷；（英）迈特；（法）米特

sentences.sentence: They found another one in Mitre Square!
sentences.translation: 在主教广场又发现一个！

sentences.sentence: And I said, Let them set a fair mitre upon his head.
sentences.translation: 我说，要将洁净的冠冕戴在他头上。

sentences.sentence: On his head was a mitre of black felt decorated with silver crescents.
sentences.translation: 头戴黑毡法冠，冠上饰有银的新月。
